title: Furnished, 4 bed, 3.5 bath + attached garage - Starting Dec or Jan
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post

We have the opportunity to work elsewhere the first half of 2023, and would love to offer up our spacious, updated townhome with 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths & attached garage to a family that might be in need of a temporary rental between Dec/Jan 2022 through Apr/May 2023.
We can offer it fully furnished and/or remove some of the furniture if needed.
Targeting $4,000/mo rent over 4-6 month window - but willing to discuss.
Reach out if interested and happy to share photos / offer a live or virtual tour.
